brainstorming.translation[0].definitions: when a group of people meet in order to try to develop ideas and think of ways of solving problems
a brainstorming session to come up with slogans for new products
brainstorming.translation[1].definitions: a way of developing new ideas and solving problems by having a meeting where everyone makes suggestions and these are discussed
Executives held a brainstorming session involving the sales force, editors, and others.
